It is characterized by its slender, pyramidal shape and dark green, needle-like leaves. The tree produces small, spherical cones that mature to a reddish-brown color. It thrives in cool, moist environments and is adapted to rocky, mountainous terrain. Due to its limited distribution and habitat threats, it is considered a vulnerable species.
